fun game to play
There is a bit of a learning curve or at least getting a handle on the controls and how the angles play out but all in all a great game.
Great animation. Beautiful graphics.

This is the best billard game I have ever seen. It works very smoothly even with an onboard graphics card, on which other games fail to run smoothly. Also, I appreciate the controls. Why is there no AI? An option to play with Computer would have been good.

Ok, after checking again, I found a lot of additional controls that are very good hidden behind the almost invisible buttons. And ball spin is accessible by clicking both mouse buttons.
But it's still annoying that the table moves when the white ball should move, and that the view spin is dependent on where you click the window.
summary: good rendering, controls very complicated, table movement annoying

description: Difficult to controll, and also the power fill up is slow.
summary: Difficult to control. but overall good

description: Way too hard to control, spend ages lining up a shot then bloody miss would be great if only used mouse control.
Complete trash, either they don't know how to code, ot they don't know how to play pool

Beautiful graphics, but the game itself isn't there yet.

There's no way to spin the balls, I've had them fire backwards (!), I found the controls to be very frustrating. 

For me, I'd like to be able to click on the ball where I want to hit it - and just click the power level rather than wait an age for a strong shot. The views would be better as icons and for taking the shot I'd want the screen to move left, right, up and down with either a left or right mouse button hold and drag and then zoom in and out with the middle roller. 

As it is, there's maybe not too much point in listening to me as I am now uninstalling it.
i love furry porn uwu
very entertaining

Die Physik dahinter ist bemerkenswert! Sogar die kleinste Berührung wird real wiedergegeben! Kann man für ein Training am Tisch empfehlen, damit man das Feeling für die Karambolagen erlangt. Die Graphik ist so ausgefeilt, dass sogar Schatten der Kugeln mitlaufen.

Habe mir das Tutorial angesehen und es wird zwar gesagt, "Sie haben den ersten Stoß geschafft", aber richtig aufziehen und wegstoßen konnte ich die weiße Kugel nicht. Vielleicht kann man mir das erklären ohne Mouse und nur mit dem Touch-Pad - danke
summary: Bei mir klappt kein einziger Stoß

description: Wer die Wirkung von mechanischen Impulsen erkennen möchte sollte unbedingt mal ein wenig spielen. Gute Grafik mit laufenden Schatten und großer Sensibilität der Bewegung. Sehr kleine und sehr große Impulse werden meiner Meinung nach perfekt wiedergegeben. Spaß beim Spiel!
La verdad que el juego marea mucho, ara hacer un tiro cuesta demasiado, no hay una vista amplia de la mesa a veces no se sabe donde están las bolas y al buscarlas el juego marea.
